#Challenge 1
Input data into R
```{r}
u <- "Stately, plump Buck Mulligan came from the stairhead, bearing a bowl of lather on which a mirror and a razor lay crossed."
u
```
Remove punctuation
```{r}
v <- gsub("[[:punct:]]","",u)
v
```
Split my string into substrings
```{r}
w <- strsplit(v," ")[[1]]
w
```

```{r}
z<-matrix(w, nrow = 22 , ncol = 1)
z
```
```{r}
z[c(3,6,9,12,15,18,21)]
```
